flawed_nl_solution:
After losing some socks, Caroline has 40 - 4 = <<40-4=63>>63 pairs of socks
Caroline donates 63 * (2/3) = <<63*2/3=42>>42 pairs of socks to the thrift store
After donating some socks, Caroline has 63 - 42 = <<63-42=21>>21 pairs of socks remaining
After getting new socks, Caroline has 21 + 10 + 3 = <<21+10+3=34>>34 pairs of socks
#### 34

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
